definition: to inlay/to embed/to set (e.g. a jewel in a ring)/tiling/tesselation
see 赤嵌樓|赤嵌楼[Chi4 kan3 lou2]

sentences.english: Short dangling chains shine with multi-coloured bezel-set crystals.
sentences.chinese: 悬挂着的短饰链配上富多种颜色的包边镶嵌水晶。

sentences.english: Semi-precious stones were used for inlay ornamentation.
sentences.chinese: 准宝石的石头用来做镶嵌装饰。

sentences.english: The church's east window has beautifully coloured glass.
sentences.chinese: 教堂朝东的窗子是用精美的彩色玻璃镶嵌成的。

sentences.english: A glass cabinet holds a horse saddle encrusted in gems.
sentences.chinese: 一个玻璃柜台放着外表镶嵌着宝石的马鞍。

sentences.english: The third chapter is about the development and spread of late imperial mosaic.
sentences.chinese: 第三章是关于帝国晚期镶嵌画的发展和流传情况。

sentences.english: The incense wood is studded fixedly in the side wall and the bottom surface of the pocket respectively.
sentences.chinese: 所述的香木块分别镶嵌固定在袋体侧壁和底面上。

sentences.english: Internal walls are lined with wood panelling that forms a warm, neutral backdrop to the space.
sentences.chinese: 建筑内墙采用木质镶嵌版营造出一个温暖中立的空间。

sentences.english: In cytogenetics, mosaicism is also sometimes referred to as mixoploidy .
sentences.chinese: 在细胞遗传学中，镶嵌性有时也称为混倍体。

sentences.english: A large press, inlaid with agate and lapis-lazuli, filled one.
sentences.chinese: 一个镶嵌着玛瑙和琉璃的大衣柜占满了墙的一角。

sentences.english: Church, in the dark hold of mosaic stone, stone carvings of flowers on the figures.
sentences.chinese: 牌坊柱下镶嵌抱鼓石，石板上有人物花卉雕刻。

sentences.english: The embedded color is the jewel of the painting and clothing of the mortal world.
sentences.chinese: 彩色镶嵌是画里珠宝，人间衣衫。

sentences.english: The electrical circuits are embedded in the lens which creates a display within the eyeball.
sentences.chinese: 镶嵌于镜片中的电流能在眼球之内形成图像。

sentences.english: Had dI the heavens' embroidered cloths, inwrought with golden and silver light.
sentences.chinese: 假若我有天神的绣袍，镶嵌着金光和银光。

sentences.english: Allowed are inlays of natural fibres and viscose only.
sentences.chinese: 允许是镶嵌天然纤维和粘胶只。

sentences.english: You can order a small cross made of brass or from precious metals with precious stones.
sentences.chinese: 你可以定做一个小十字，镶嵌黄铜或贵金属与宝石。

sentences.english: Onyx stones, and stones to be set in the ephod, and in the breastplate.
sentences.chinese: 红玛瑙与别样的宝石，可以镶嵌在以弗得和胸牌上。

definition: see 赤嵌樓|赤嵌楼[Chi4 kan3 lou2]

small diamonds/melee (small diamonds used in embellishing mountings for larger gems)/splints (sharp-pointed diamond splinters)/clatersal (small diamond splints from which diamond powder is produced by crushing)

pinyin: Shi1 hua2 luo4 shi4 qi2 shui3 jing1
